laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Rising levels; 10.7 ng/mL at subsequent examination.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Malignant cells consistent with transitional-cell carcinoma.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Three and a half years prior, found malignant cells; later examinations showed no abnormalities, followed by positive results again.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the Abdomen and Pelvis
laboratory_examinations.findings: Circumferential thickening and small irregular filling defects in midportion of the left ureter.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Slight enlargement of the mass noted three months before examination.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Blood Urea Nitrogen and Creatinine Levels
laboratory_examinations.findings: Rising creatinine levels ranging from 1.8 to 2.3 mg/dL (reference range: 0.6 to 1.5).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Creatinine levels began to rise after ileal-interposition surgery.
